physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Pelvic examination reveals a thick white cervical discharge, no masses, and no tenderness on cervical motion. Microscopic examination of the discharge reveals white cells and hyphae.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: CD4 lymphocyte count: 0.279 x 10^9 cells/L; HIV viral load: 134,000 copies/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient started antiretroviral therapy (ART) with zidovudine plus lamivudine and efavirenz.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: HIV-1 RNA level: nondetectable; CD4 lymphocyte count: 0.499 x 10^9 cells/L
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No anemia or thrombocytopenia; liver and renal functions normal.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: HIV-1 RNA level: 76,000 copies/mL; CD4 lymphocyte count: 0.32 x 10^9 cells/L
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient reported not adhering to the antiretroviral regimen, stating difficulty remembering to take the medications.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase in HIV-1 RNA level and decrease in CD4 lymphocyte count.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: HIV-1 RNA level: still nondetectable; CD4 lymphocyte count: 0.501 x 10^9 cells/L
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Gynecologic examination normal; abnormal Pap smear showing a low-grade squamous intraepithelial lesion.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial low-grade lesion observed; patient previously had HIV viral load at satisfactory levels.
